mapper.select: select t.ID id, t.USER_NAME userName, t.LOGIN_NAME loginName, t.PASSWORD password, t.ROLE_ID roleId, b.ROLE_NAME roleName, t.CREATE_USER_ID createUserId, t.CREATE_DATA createDate, t.UPDATE_USER_ID updateUserId, t.UPDATE_DATA updateDate from t_sys_account t LEFT JOIN t_sys_role b ON t.ROLE_ID=b.ID where t.OPEN_ID=#{openid} AND t.DELETE_FLAG='1'

select t.ID id, t.USER_NAME userName, t.LOGIN_NAME loginName, t.PASSWORD password, t.ROLE_ID roleId, t.CREATE_USER_ID createUserId, t.CREATE_DATA createDate, t.UPDATE_USER_ID updateUserId, t.UPDATE_DATA updateDate from t_sys_account t where t.LOGIN_NAME=#{loginName} AND t.DELETE_FLAG='1'
